item.description:
For those who have seen the movie "The Matrix" know that Neo chose the red pill and opened to the reality of a world where anything is possible as long as you believe it to be true.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=te6qG4yn-Ps

About a month ago many chose the Red pill and broadened their reality to the Divine Matrix by understanding how quantum physics is shaping a higher level of understanding “Reality.”

Simply stated, “Every person creates his or her own reality and experiences it subjectively.” We explored the connection between us and our Universe, how the Matrix works, and that we communicate through our emotions.

Want to learn more?
"Matrix Energetics® is a complete system of transformation that produces observable and verifiable changes that can be taught to others as easily as any other life skill. Matrix Energetics encompasses a new state of mind, a new way of looking at the world we live and breathe in, and a new way of reaching out to new possibilities - a consciousness shift."

Please join Guest speaker Kathleen McGilvray as we explore The Matrix Energetics.

Kathleenintegrates Matrix Energetics in her life and works as a massage therapist. She is certified in Matrix Energetics, the Benjamin System of Muscular Therapy, Pregnancy Massage, Caring for Clients with Cancer, and Reiki. She holds a Bachelors of Science in Business Administration from Northeastern University and is a graduate of the Katharine Gibbs School.

For more information on Matrix Energetics, please vist:  http://www.matrixenergetics.com

We will be meet from 7:00pm-8:30pm.
See you there! 

Ellen
Organizer
617-750-4830
item.how_to_find_us: Please ring the side door bell and then find us in the Palor down stairs.

group.name: The North-of-Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Integrating Matrix Energetics with Guest Speaker - Kathleen McGilvray
